chunks.zh: 想买一个 iPad 当做爱奇艺工具。
chunks.en: Want to buy an iPad to use as an iQiyi (Chinese streaming service) tool.

chunks.zh: 哪个比较适合，air 还是 pro? 在想或者买个好点的 Android 平板？大家有啥子推荐。
chunks.en: Which is more suitable, the Air or the Pro? Or should I buy a better Android tablet? Any recommendations?

chunks.zh: mini7 就足够了,air pro 都太大,床上没法用
chunks.en: The mini 7 is enough. The Air and Pro are too big to use in bed.

chunks.zh: 推荐用现有的钱美股抄底爱奇艺，一个月后卖掉，应该可以随心所欲买顶配。
chunks.en: I recommend using the money you have to buy iQiyi stocks at their low point on the US stock market, sell them after a month, and you should be able to buy the top configuration as you wish.

chunks.zh: pro 音响好得多
chunks.en: The Pro's speakers are much better.

chunks.zh: 只看国内流媒体，那我建议安卓板子。iPad 便宜的屏幕很烂，贵的只看国内流媒体的话那性价比也太低了
chunks.en: If you only watch domestic streaming media, then I suggest an Android tablet. The screens on the cheaper iPads are terrible, and the expensive ones are not cost-effective if you only watch domestic streaming media.

chunks.zh: 有同样的想法，但是看了下现在 air 都涨价了不少，之前买二代 air 应该是两三千。只用来看视频花四五千有点不值当，准备看看安卓的
chunks.en: I have the same idea, but after looking at it, the Air's price has increased a lot. I bought the second-generation Air for two or three thousand before. Spending four or five thousand just to watch videos is not worth it, so I'm going to look at Android tablets.

chunks.zh: @Awes0me 主要国内还是 B 站，国外的话是油管和网飞。自己有个比较拉的荣耀 pad ，下载不了 google 三件套。
chunks.en: @Awes0me Mainly Bilibili in China, and YouTube and Netflix abroad. I have a pretty bad Honor Pad that can't download the Google suite.

chunks.zh: 手持 M4 款 pro 和 M2 款 air ，我个人感觉两款音响都不咋地，而且音量比手机都轻pro 是 4 扬声器，不过 air 现在也是两侧都有扬声器了，没啥追求的话建议直接国补买低配 air
chunks.en: Holding an M4 Pro and an M2 Air, I personally feel that the speakers of both are not very good, and the volume is lighter than a phone. The Pro has 4 speakers, but the Air now also has speakers on both sides. If you don't have much pursuit, I suggest buying a low-end Air with the national subsidy directly.

chunks.zh: 视频启动器的话推荐下 小米 6s pro ，我都已经买了 2 个了，音效不错
chunks.en: For a video launcher, I recommend the Xiaomi 6s Pro, which I have already bought 2 of. The sound effect is good.

chunks.zh: 国补现在 4077 抄底能翻两倍呀。哈哈哈
chunks.en: With the national subsidy, buying at the low point of 4077 can double your money. Hahaha.

chunks.zh: @GLSLG 影音不错，不过打游戏别碰。高分辨率玩压缩到低分辨率的游戏会出现线条摩尔纹（我就是 6sp 卖了二手）
chunks.en: @GLSLG The audio and video are good, but don't play games. Playing games with high resolution compressed to low resolution will produce line moiré patterns (I sold my 6sp second-hand because of this).

chunks.zh: 真爱奇艺 还是国外正经流媒体呢爱奇艺 b 站 这种码率低的 基本都是 sdr 的 确实没必要买 iPad 便宜的屏幕扬声器不行 贵的片源不行浪费屏幕但是如果是 Netflix 之类的真流媒体 hdr 内容消费的多的话 那么 iPad 优势大很多 miniled 或者 tandem oled 的 iPad Pro 配合四扬声器 观影效果非常好
chunks.en: Do you really like iQiyi, or mainstream foreign streaming services? iQiyi and Bilibili have low bitrates and are basically SDR, so there's really no need to buy an iPad. The cheaper ones have bad screens and speakers, and the expensive ones have bad content, which is a waste of the screen. However, if you consume a lot of HDR content from real streaming services like Netflix, then the iPad has a much bigger advantage. A miniLED or tandem OLED iPad Pro with four speakers has a very good viewing experience.

chunks.zh: 父亲住院无聊，给他买了一个看电视刷新闻。vivo pad air 8+128 淘宝百亿补贴+政府补贴，大概 1200+。反正给他看电视刷新闻是够了。
chunks.en: My father was bored in the hospital, so I bought him one to watch TV and browse the news. A Vivo Pad Air 8+128 with Taobao 10 Billion Subsidy + government subsidy, was about 1200+. Anyway, it's enough for him to watch TV and browse the news.

chunks.zh: @GLSLG 小米的能装 Google 三件套不。
chunks.en: @GLSLG Can Xiaomi install the Google suite?

chunks.zh: @yuejieyao #5 24 款 pro 的扬声器甚至都不如 18 款 Pro 的扬声器
chunks.en: @yuejieyao #5 The speakers of the 2024 Pro are not even as good as the speakers of the 2018 Pro.

chunks.zh: @laommmm 直接上 oppo pad3 8+128 的也 1200 多，配置好很多
chunks.en: @laommmm Just get the OPPO Pad3 8+128, which is also 1200+, and the configuration is much better.

chunks.zh: @WangStormstout 能，里面自带。现在就是 抖音 和 YouTube 启动器
chunks.en: @WangStormstout Yes, it comes with it. Now it's just a Douyin and YouTube launcher.

chunks.zh: 我也建议安卓哈哈哈
chunks.en: I also recommend Android hahaha.

chunks.zh: @clf #9 是的，就是用来影音的，不玩游戏。在大屏上玩游戏也累
chunks.en: @clf #9 Yes, it's just for audio and video, not for playing games. It's also tiring to play games on a big screen.

chunks.zh: 我是华为 matepad pro 14 存
chunks.en: I have a Huawei Matepad Pro 14.

chunks.zh: @tongjiann 这我倒不清楚，不过我每天晚上上床，从 iphone14pm 切换成 M4 pro 的时候，都会觉的声音突然变小变闷，挺明显的
chunks.en: @tongjiann I don't know about that, but every night when I get into bed and switch from my iPhone 14 Pro Max to the M4 Pro, I feel that the sound suddenly becomes smaller and muffled, which is quite obvious.
